statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_training_data;
SELECT training_id, input_data FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE training_id = '1';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE output_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT training_id FROM neural_network_training_data ORDER BY training_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(training_id) FROM neural_network_training_data;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE training_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE training_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE output_data->>'accuracy' >= '0.90'
SELECT training_id, output_data FROM neural_network_training_data WHERE input_data->>'loss' < '0.10' ORDER BY training_id DESC
SELECT AVG((output_data->>'accuracy')::float) AS average_accuracy FROM neural_network_training_data GROUP BY training_id HAVING COUNT(training_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM data;
SELECT id, data_value FROM data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_value FROM data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data WHERE data_value > 0.5;
SELECT model_id, epoch_count FROM training_status ORDER BY epoch_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM data ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT id, data_value FROM data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data_value FROM data WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT data_value, id FROM data WHERE id = 10 OR id = 20 ORDER BY data_value;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM data;
SELECT name, training_status FROM neural_networks WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM training_data ORDER BY data_id DESC
SELECT neural_network_id, data_output FROM training_data WHERE data_id > 10
SELECT log_text, log_time FROM training_logs WHERE neural_network_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC
SELECT * FROM neural_networks WHERE training_status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM neural_networks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, training_status FROM neural_networks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT neural_networks.name, training_data.data_input, training_data.data_output FROM neural_networks JOIN training_data ON neural_networks.id = training_data.neural_network_id;

SELECT neural_networks.name, training_logs.log_text, training_logs.log_time FROM neural_networks JOIN training_logs ON neural_networks.id = training_logs.neural_network_id WHERE training_logs.log_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_neural_networks FROM neural_networks;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT id, data FROM training_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, model_name FROM model_parameters WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM training_logs WHERE training_id = 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, session_start, session_end FROM training_sessions WHERE session_end IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT id, data ->> 'parameter1' AS parameter1, timestamp FROM training_data WHERE data ->> 'parameter2' = 'value';
SELECT model_name, parameters -> 'learning_rate' AS learning_rate FROM model_parameters WHERE parameters -> 'optimizer' = 'adam' ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT training_id, log_text FROM training_logs WHERE training_id IN (SELECT id FROM training_data WHERE data ->> 'status' = 'completed');
SELECT id, session_start, COALESCE(session_end, 'Session still in progress') AS session_end FROM training_sessions;
SELECT * FROM TrainingData WHERE data_id = 1;
SELECT data_value FROM TrainingData WHERE training_status = true;
SELECT loss, accuracy FROM EpochProgress ORDER BY epoch_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ModelHistory WHERE model_version LIKE 'v2%';
SELECT param_name, param_value FROM ModelParams WHERE param_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM TrainingData WHERE training_status = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM TrainingData ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT param_name, param_value FROM ModelParams WHERE param_value > 0.5 ORDER BY param_value DESC;
SELECT epoch_id, loss, accuracy FROM EpochProgress WHERE accuracy >= 0.8 AND loss < 0.1;
SELECT model_version, training_timestamp FROM ModelHistory WHERE model_version LIKE 'v1.%';
